title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Panic out there over Trump Tulsa rally. People ask Rush why Trump doesn't stop fighting the media. Tulsa crowd size makes sense considering lead up scare coverage by the media. Trump was annoyed at circumstances around Tulsa rally. Fauci denies Trump ever ordered slowdown in coronavirus testing, Trump this morning on tearing down statues, joke about coronavirus testing at rally. Trump was at his best in Tulsa when he focused on Biden. Marxists tear down statues. We're in a battle with Marxists for the future of America. Rush's prediction that professional sports and Millennial women were propelling Black Lives Matter. Trump finding his voice standing up to the statue toppers. No other elected Republicans are standing up and saying it's wrong.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

We're in an Access Hollywood moment. Rush lists all the things that were supposed to be the end of Trump, but weren't. Marxist uprising is the latest plan to take out Trump. When will we get over racism? Black Lives Matter takes over sports, they will no longer allow it to be an escape from the world. ESPYs open on BLM. Corporate sensitivity training. Hogan Gidley moved from White House to Trump campaign. New coronavirus outbreaks aren't overwhelming hospitals. Rush wishes his niece Caitlyn a Happy Birthday.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

New homes sales rise in May. Trump Tulsa rally was highest rated Saturday night in Fox News history. Polls right now are meaningless. Trump will win big. Inside the Florida poll showing Biden ahead. Photo of Trump coming back from Tulsa made liberals think he's giving up. Victor Davis Hanson: Civilization is on the ballot in November. Washington and Jefferson are next. Will Marxists try to disrupt the election? Jewish caller: My ancestors have been slaves throughout history. BLM founder admits their goal is to remove Trump. Removal of Grant statue. Kimmel used the n-word, Democrats love to wear blackface. BET Founder Robert Johnson wants BLM to break from Dems, create third party.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
